name: Glitterati
description:
Fírrine has always disliked and distrusted the outside world, preferring the safety and comfort of her room and the conspiracy-theory underground muckraking radio journalism of her idol, the Glitter Wizard. When her parents tragically die in an explosion at the glitter factory where they work, Fírrine's world is thrown into chaos. Convinced that Gaylord Fauntleroy, the fabulous and foppish owner of the glitter factory, is behind the deaths of her parents, Fírrine leaves the sanctuary of her room in a quest to discover the truth.

Created in collaboration with aanatra and Squall as a student project at the New York Film Academy.
